data.description: STRATEGIST — CRITICAL AUDIT: Nucleus OS. Answer the existential question. (1) What is the ONE thing Nucleus can do in the next 30 days that OpenClaw cannot or will not? Be specific — name the feature, the target user, and the demo. (2) What is the minimum lovable product (MLP) — the smallest version of Nucleus that produces an undeniable 'wow'? (3) Design the black swan engineered event — what sequence of public actions (Reddit, GitHub, demo video, blog post) over 14 days gives Nucleus the best shot at a viral moment? (4) How does Nucleus position itself: consumer dev tool, enterprise agent OS, or sovereign AI OS for builders? Pick one and defend it. Read engram: NUCLEUS_CRITICAL_AUDIT_FEB19_PROBLEM_STATEMENT.
